fund: Name of the private-equity or investment fund that holds the position.
investment: Portfolio company or asset in which the fund has invested.
quarter: Reporting period shown as fiscal quarter and year (e.g., “Q4 2023”).
investment_cost_usd_mil: Cumulative capital invested (cost basis) in the asset, expressed in millions of U.S. dollars.
pct_of_ownership: Percentage equity stake the fund owns in the underlying investment.
realized_value_usd_mil: Cash proceeds already received from partial or full exits, in millions of U.S. dollars.
unrealized_value_usd_mil: Fair value of the remaining (not yet exited) portion of the investment, in millions of U.S. dollars.
total_value_usd_mil: Combined realized and unrealized value of the investment, in millions of U.S. dollars.
moic: Multiple on invested capital; ratio of total value to investment cost (dimensionless).
irr: Annualized internal rate of return generated by the investment, expressed as a decimal.
total_value_dol_change_yoy: Absolute year-over-year change in total value, in millions of U.S. dollars.
total_value_pct_change_yoy: Percentage year-over-year change in total value.
